item.title: IT Project Manager (financial district)
item.description:
Challenging global IT Project Management role working on multiple big ticket IT projects, development and infrastructure, in a dynamic financial services environment. The Project Manager is responsible for managing end-to-end, full life-cycle client projects from inception and requirements definition through to delivery.

The core tasks of this role include developing statements of work, scheduling, budgeting and authoring requirement definition documents. This is a client-facing role requiring effective communication and management across several disciplines: strategy, the business, technology, quality assurance and client services. You will work closely with business oriented and technical client delivery teams as well as other third party providers. Exceptional planning ability is essential.

Mandatory experience required: Applicants will have a background in IT Project Management and have PMP Certification and a practical understanding of various software development methodologies including the likes of Agile, Waterfall and / or RUP. You will have worked with ITIL in a business setting and ideally possess ITIL certification. Your skills will have been developed in a client facing capacity working as a consultant PM and your experience working within large financial services organisations will be clearly evident and is essential. The ideal candidate will have worked across global projects, possess great communication skills and have a flair for motivating different teams to get the work done.

MorningGroup is an established consultancy firm and we strive to employ positive, professional and innovative consultants to work with our clients. We can offer the opportunity to work with leading international financial services firms on cutting edge technology projects. YouÂ’ll brush shoulders with talented and dynamic individuals and earn a competitive remuneration package comprised of salary and benefits.
